thread.section_title: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Skipper (formerly Jetaport) | hiskipper.com | 2 of 59
thread.title: Shamara Manon
thread.title_full: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) reviewed by Shamara Manon

author: Shamara Manon
title: Shamara Manon
text: I really enjoyed the convenience of having someone reach out to the hotels for me. I previously did an inquiry on a hotel room block for Holiday Inn but the communication was slow and unclear. I lost interest but felt like I had to use them because I didn't want to waste my time with another search. Alina from Skipper helped me get a Quote: from Hampton Inn and it was just so fast and easy. I signed my room block contract and I'm glad it's out of the way! I definitely recommend!
